thread.title: Urban Meyer wants to get many players more touches
thread.title_full: Urban Meyer wants to get many players more touches

author: Andrew Holleran
title: Urban Meyer wants to get many players more touches
text:
Urban Meyer wants to get many players more touches College Spun 21 hrs ago Andrew Holleran © Greg Bartram-USA TODAY Sports Urban Meyer wants to get many of his players more touches. Once Ohio State’s offense starts playing at the level most expected it to prior to the season -- a great to all-time great level -- the biggest problem for the Buckeyes will probably be this: there’s only one football.
AdChoices Ohio State’s offense features an absurd amount of players that deserve to touch the ball on nearly every play. Through four games, here are some players Urban Meyer wants to get more touches: Braxton Miller, Curtis Samuel, Dontre Wilson and Ezekiel Elliott.
Does Curtis Samuel deserve more touches? Meyer: “Yes.”
— Tim Shoemaker (@TimShoemaker) September 30, 2015
Meyer on Curtis Samuel: “I see a guy that’s dynamic and needs more touches.” #Buckeyes
— Ryan Donnelly (@RDonnellyBG) September 30, 2015
Urban Meyer wants Braxton Miller to get more touches. Asked the media to draw up some ideas and give them to his SID.
— Austin Ward (@AWardESPN) September 30, 2015
Meyer said Curtis Samuel deserves more touches. Dontre Wilson deserves more touches. Elliott.. Miller also.
— Bill Rabinowitz (@brdispatch) September 30, 2015
It’s a good problem to have.
Ohio State is set to face Indiana on Saturday at 3:30 p.m. E.T.
